title: VPN Cost Lab
lessonDescription: Add cost visibility to your workflow so you can compare quality, speed, and spend before rollout.
proof: A practical cost-control simulator where spend, routing, and policy tradeoffs are visible immediately.
Operators can test governance-sensitive settings without breaking core flow logic.

title: Vibe â†’ PRAL
lessonDescription: Learn how to turn a rough request into a concrete plan with clear steps, ownership, and decision checkpoints.
proof: A diagram-first pathway that turns fuzzy intent into PRAL-structured action decisions.
Each transition is validated against policy and explainability checkpoints.

title: The Kinetic Kitchen 2.0
lessonDescription: Convert that plan into a repeatable workflow your team can run consistently, with clear handoffs and guardrails.
proof: A visual order-routing environment for workflow, routing, and escalation behavior.
Quality, throughput, and policy controls stay visible as each step evolves.

title: Kitchen X-Ray
lessonTitle: Find Risk Before It Becomes an Incident
lessonDescription: Identify weak points early and test safety and policy failure paths before they create real operational issues.
proof: A structured safety walkthrough that highlights role-level risks before they escalate.
Learners inspect transitions to identify policy failures and recovery actions.

title: Neural Glass
lessonDescription: Make outputs explainable so teams can see why the model chose an answer and challenge decisions with evidence.
proof: A practical signal-to-decision walkthrough where confidence is explicit at each step.
Inputs, feature influence, and outputs stay linked for transparent challenge and review.

title: The AI Kitchen
lessonDescription: Run a final go-live review to confirm controls, risk posture, and decision quality before launch.
proof: A final readiness simulation that links control surfaces to deployment confidence.
The experience closes with a practical outcome map from decision trace to action.
